name: Feeling Lucky?
description:
Local 1v1 western gun dueling game. You have one shot, and one life. Make 'em count.

The longer you wait, the more likely you'll hit.  You want to shoot first, but you also want to wait as long as possible.

Recommended way to play: Have the 2 players stand or sit next to the computer, with hands behind their backs, as the game starts. This way reaching for the button is a big movement, giving the other player some time to act.

There is also a single player option, but that lacks the bluffing, and feinting, and mind-games that make this fun, so I recommend you grab a friend for this.
